channel.title: Relictus 525 Oldschool rsps
channel.description:
[img]http://i60.tinypic.com/6f2pom.jpg[/img] Relictus is an oldschool Runescape private server (rsps). Relictus offers you a friendly community, flawless and unique content, active PvP and most of all a cozy server.
Links
[url=http://relictus.net/]http://relictus.net/[/url]Relictus | Website [url=http://relictus.net/client.jar]http://relictus.net/client.jar[/url]Relictus | Downloadable client [url=http://relictus.net/webclient.php]http://relictus.net/webclient.php[/url]Relictus | Webclient
Media [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2vv02h4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2cdibnt.jpg[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/n37k9i.jpg[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2dqrmed.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/1z2hhk3.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/14m9xm9.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2l905km.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2luazuq.jpg[/img]
Features
PvM
Bosses - Dagganoth kings - Chaos elemental - Corperal beast - Godwars dungeon - Kalphite queen - King black dragon - Tormented demons - Giant mole - Troll general
Dungeons - Brimhaven dungeon - Edgeville dungeon - Relekka slayer dungeon - Taverley dungeon - Slayer tower
Other - Rock crabs - Green dragons - Mithril dragons
PvP
- Perfect switching - Pvp area at home - All potions with correct delay - Serveral other PvP areas
Skilling
- All 21 skills that belong to a 525 style server are working. - You can train almost every skill at home, take a look at the media. - Many different slayer tasks (easy, medium hard and boss tasks) with rewards. - Good xp rate, not too slow and not too fast. - This server will certainly provide you a great skilling experience.
Minigames
- Flawless barrows - Castle wars - Duel arena - Ranging guild - Thzaar cave
Misc
- Easter ring gambling - Clue scrolls with normal and rare rewards - Random events - Weekly events hosted by mods - 4 different quests - Achievements with achievement points shop - Clan chat - Credits shop and awesome donator features - Some customs added not too much
Website - Highscores - Vote for reward (Choose between 1 hour double xp or vote points) - Monster database - Forum - Top 3 player kills on homepage

item.title: Relictus 525 Oldschool rsps
item.dc:creator: @lourence lourence
item.description:
@lourence wrote:

[quote=“lourence, post:1, topic:550793”]
Relictus is an oldschool Runescape private server (rsps). Relictus offers you a friendly community, flawless and unique content, active PvP and most of all a cozy server.

Links

http://relictus.net/Relictus | Website
http://relictus.net/client.jarRelictus | Downloadable client
http://relictus.net/webclient.phpRelictus | Webclient

Media







Features

PvM

Bosses

  • Dagganoth kings

  • Kalphite queen
  • King black dragon
  • Tormented demons
  • Giant mole

  • Relekka slayer dungeon
  • Taverley dungeon
  • Slayer tower

PvP

  • Perfect switching
  • Pvp area at home
  • All potions with correct delay
  • Serveral other PvP areas

Skilling

  • All 21 skills that belong to a 525 style server are working.
  • You can train almost every skill at home, take a look at the media.
  • Many different slayer tasks (easy, medium hard and boss tasks) with rewards.
  • Good xp rate, not too slow and not too fast.
  • This server will certainly provide you a great skilling experience.

Minigames

  • Flawless barrows
  • Castle wars
  • Duel arena
  • Ranging guild
  • Thzaar cave

Misc

  • Easter ring gambling

  • Random events

  • Achievements with achievement points shop
  • Clan chat
  • Credits shop and awesome donator features
  • Some customs added not too much

  • Monster database

  • Top 3 player kills on homepage[/quote]
